title: Inferno
description: Symbology professor Robert Langdon wakes up with amnesia in Italy. There he will have the help of Dr. Sienna Brooks to, together, travel around Europe trying to thwart a lethal conspiracy that threatens the entire planet.

title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
description: Jack Reacher uncovers a statewide plot to frame Susan Turner, the former head of his unit, for treason against the government. Reacher will have to get her out of jail and fight to clear their names.

title: Star Trek Beyond
description: After being stranded on a hostile planet following an attack in space, Kirk, Spock and the rest of the crew must face a deadly alien race while trying to find a way out of this hellish place.

title: Doctor Strange
description: After suffering an accident, a brilliant and arrogant surgeon seeks rehabilitation using alternative techniques. His attempts lead him to discover that he has been appointed to lead the fight against a dark, supernatural force.

title: The Girl on the Train
description: Rachel Watson, a woman with alcohol problems who envies how little she can see of the perfect life of Scott and Megan, the couple whose house she passes every day on her way to work, discovers that something terrible has happened at the house and decides to interfere to try to solve the enigma.

title: Deepwater Horizon
description: Rachel Watson, a woman with alcohol problems who envies how little she can see of the perfect life of Scott and Megan, the couple whose house she passes every day on her way to work, discovers that something terrible has happened at the house and decides to interfere to try to solve the enigma.

title: A Monster Calls
description: A 12-year-old boy conjures up a monster in his imagination and it helps him deal with his miserable life and teaches him courage.
